thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I was looking for a solution to having a US phone number while I was in the US and data while I am traveling in the Caribbean. Somehow I spent about $150 USD and ran out of data and phone credit in about three days while in Miami. T-Mobil offers unlimited data, text and calls for $95 per month. Data and text work internationally, calls are .20 per minute while out of country. I just got back to the Caribbean - seems to be working so far...
